attributes.additional_details: rising gas and electricity bills , with 335000 people now in fuel poverty and being subsidised by the uk government to help them out , working families are also strugling to pay the energy bills , we are told the government is powerless to help us but in reality they are not , we are used to all the cuts and are being told its for the good of the country , i got a good cut , cut the vat on energy and tax , anybody with me on this sugestion put names up and everyone push for a change to make difference to working families
